definition.name: Find Comment
definition.description: Find an issue or pull request comment

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: GITHUB_TOKEN or a repo scoped PAT.

inputs.name: repository
inputs.description: The full name of the repository containing the issue or pull request.

inputs.name: issue-number
inputs.description: The number of the issue or pull request in which to search.

inputs.name: comment-author
inputs.description: The GitHub user name of the comment author.

inputs.name: body-includes
inputs.description: A string to search for in the body of comments.

inputs.name: body-regex
inputs.description: A regular expression to search for in the body of comments.

inputs.name: nth
inputs.description: 0-indexed number, specifying which comment to return if multiple are found

outputs.name: comment-id
outputs.description: The id of the matching comment found.

outputs.name: comment-node-id
outputs.description: The GraphQL node id of the matching comment found.

outputs.name: comment-body
outputs.description: The body of the matching comment found.

outputs.name: comment-author
outputs.description: The author of the matching comment found.

evidence.reasoning: The action is designed to find comments on issues or pull requests, which falls under communication within the context of collaboration and feedback in code quality. It also indirectly supports code quality by facilitating discussions around code changes.
